content.text: I used to work for Monsanto, but now I'm a stay-at-home mom. I enjoy reading, swimming, and shopping online.
I used to be a mechanic for 6 years, but now I build my own computers and collect bugs in jars. I also ran for political office in 2004, but I didn't win.
That's interesting. I've never met anyone who collects bugs.
It's a fun hobby. I like to study them and learn about their different habitats.
That's cool. I love learning about different things.
Me too. It's one of the things that makes life so interesting.
I agree. So, what do you like to read?
I mostly read fantasy fiction novels. I love the way they can transport me to a different world.
I love fantasy fiction too. I think it's so creative and imaginative.
Me too. It's a great way to escape from reality.
I agree. So, what are some of your favorite fantasy fiction novels?
I love the Lord of the Rings series, the Harry Potter series, and the His Dark Materials series.
I love all of those books! They're so good.
Me too. They're some of my favorite books of all time.
Me too. I'm glad we have such similar taste in books.
Me too. It makes for great conversations.
